sub_title: ASSERTIVE consultant & contractor in CAPEX and OPEX engineering projects in food & pharma, high tech, petrochemical and infrastructure.
summary:
1. Engineering contracting/consulting in New CAPEX or OPEX improvement//

These are clients I have in my portfolio and experienced:
Polypeptides SA, NRG, Marel,Danone Nutricia,Photonis, MeadJohnson, Essity, Mitsubishi, Albemarle, Danone Global, Jacobs Douwe Egberts, Danone Medical, Encotech bv, Kongberg Defense, Airbus Defense(Dutch Space), OTB-Diplay, Philips Apptech Medical, ASML, Marel (Stork PMT), KH-Engineering, Afval Energy Amsterdam, Philips ETG Almelo(VDL), Minivalves international, Cordis Europa, Deerns, Arcelor Mittal South Africa, Charles Pein & Partners.

2. Other activities//

KEVANG ETH: Engineering Consulting in Western Europe in new CAPEX or OPEX improvement.
Muskad ETH bv in the Netherlands : Venture capital.
Muskad ETH LTD (Kenya): Venture capital.
Muskad ETH SARL (DR Congo): Trade,Venture capital, Engineering Consulting

2. Sectors of activities//

I operate in the following sectors in manufacturing/production or research and development: 
A. Life science: Food, Pharma and Healthcare.
B. Petrochemical industry.
C. Recycling and plastic
D. Infrastructure.
E. High Tech, semiconductors.
F. High Tech, aerospace
G. Logistics and infrastructure.
H. Energy sector.
